iana.template_text:
From: Thomas Olsson <thomas&vinga.se>
To: "'iana&isi.edu'" <iana&ISI.EDU>
Subject: Registration of media types vnd.ecowin.chart, vnd.ecowin.series, 
	vnd.ecowin.filerequest, vnd.ecowin.fileupdate, vnd.ecowin.seriesrequest, 
	vnd.ecowin.seriesupdate
Date: Thu, 19 Mar 1998 18:19:59 +0100

MIME media type name : Application
MIME subtype name : File update - vnd.ecowin.fileupdate
Required parameters : None.
Optional parameters : VERSION
Encoding considerations : EcoWin file updates are binary
Security considerations: This type does not contain any executable code
or macros. It contains updates of a set of configuration files for the
EcoWin Client and is returned in the response of an HTTP POST request
with data of type vnd.ecowin.filerequest.
Interoperability considerations:
Published specification: Not available.
Applications which use this media type: EcoWin

2. File extension(s) :
